item.description:
Today's deal on BuyWith Me!!

$25 for Up To $70 of Food and Drinks by the Theater District

To some, the word 'ivy' elicits images of old world charm and prestige—from beautiful brick buildings laced with vine overgrowth to reputable Ivy League schools.

But to us, Ivy is much more modern and mouthwatering. Ivy is Italian-inspired tapas and a wine list where most bottles are priced at $26 (or $9 a glass). Ivy is live jazz from 9 pm to 1 am every Friday and live Bossa Nova from 9 pm to 1 am every Saturday. Ivy is a date spot, lunch spot, after work drink spot, and night-on-the-town spot. And with today’s deal all that is Ivy is yours for less.

$50 of Food and Drinks ($70 after 10 pm on Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays)
(Save up to 64%)
Your cost: $25.00

and more deals available at www.BuyWithMe.com

http://us1.campaign-a...

http://www.ivyrestaur...

We'll reserve a table, with a sign "Euro"

Maia 781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Italian-inspired small plates, jazz, fondue, and a wine
